DESCRIPTION: Planning to purchase a plot in trivandrum? This plot in vattappara is situated in one of the excellent locations of the city. It spans over spectacular 5 cents super built up area. Here, a solid foundation can easily withhold construction of 3 floors. To secure the perimeter, a boundary wall is present around the property. The possession of the property can be received within 3 months. The property is owned under freehold contract. The plot is available at a price of  12 lac. The owner is open for negotiation. The residential plot is north-Facing. The plot is close to school and close to market.

DESCRIPTION:
Square corner plot with road on two sides, just opposite to children's park and 50 meters distance to cricket/ foot ball ground. The most prime property in prasanth nagar with enough space to park 4 cars. Corner plot with no house es on the eastern side of the plot, the land is always filled with cool breeze with good air circulation especially coming from the east side of the plot.

The property is located just 3 kms proximity to medical college, sree chitra institute of medical sciences, regional cancer center, only 6 kms to lullu mall, 3 kms to aakkulam boat house, 8 kms to technopark, 8 kms to railway station, 9 kms to international airport. Major malls, shopping centers, government offices are all located within 10 kms vicinity of the property.

House is 40 years old but well maintained and many modifications and changes made in the previous years. 24x7 water supply is available with 2 tanks of 1000 litres each on the ground floor and 1000 litres and 500 litres tank on the terrace.

The house and land is the most ideal place for people to enjoy a serene peaceful atmosphere and relax. The plot is very ideal for doctors especially who have a large client base as there is too much space available for parking and enough space to build a separate consultation room.

DESCRIPTION: 3.5 cents of prime residential land in nettayam, manikandeswaram, located in the heart of trivandrum. This well-Positioned plot comes with a secure boundary wall and direct road access, making it ideal for building your dream home. All essential amenities such as schools, hospitals, shops, and public transport are available nearby. The area is peaceful yet well-Connected, offering both comfort and convenience. Suitable for immediate construction or as a smart investment in a fast-Developing neighborhood. Serious buyers, contact now for details and site visit.
